body.codeblock: <structuredBody> <component> <!-- Death Information Template --> <section> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.1"/> <code code="69409-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="U.S. standard certificate of death - 2003 revision"/> <title/> <confidentialityCode code="Value"/> <entry> <!-- Time of Death Observation --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.13"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <!-- Location of Death Observation --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.10"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <!-- Death Location Type Observation --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.11"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.15"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.12"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <!-- Tobacco Use - This is optional --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.14"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <!-- Injury - This is optional --> <organizer classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.9"/> </organizer> </entry> <entry> <!-- Cause of Death --> <organizer classCode="CLUSTER" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.6"/> </organizer> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.2"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.3"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.24.1.14"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.4"/> </observation> </entry> </section> </component> </structuredBody>
